name: http-tester
short_description:
HTTP server performance tester, realized with erlang. Just a gen_server. You can call hpt:start(url,para) in erlang shell to start it, or call hpt:stop() to stop it, and post(ClientNum?,TryTimes?) to start post http request or get(ClientNum?,TryTimes?) to start get http request. After running, it gives report every 5 seconds: Speed[Cur:52,Avg:46],Total:949,Fail[Cur:8,All:45],Interval[Max:10766,Min:47,Avg:1626],Time:4641 And at the same time, the reports saved in "./log".

If you want to get a graphical report, replace "Speed[Cur:" with "", replace ",Avg:" with tab, and etc. Then use excel open the file, you can analysis it with excel.

If you want to get more options, just find them in start/3,start/4,start/5, post/3,get/3.
